TitleEnglish: Saving 80,000 Gold in Another World for My Retirement
SummaryEnglish: One day, Mitsuha falls off a cliff and is transported to a medieval Europe–type world! After a near-death encounter with a pack of wolves, she then realizes that she's able to transport between two worlds—this one and her own. Taking advantage of this ability, Mitsuha decides to live in both worlds and calculates that she'll need 80,000 gold coins to be able to retire! Mitsuha now has to come up with different ways to collect her gold coins!
Aliases: Rōgo ni Sonaete Isekai de 8-Man-Mai no Kinka wo Tamemasu
Rougo ni Sonaete Isekai de 8-manmai no Kinka wo Tamemasu
Saving 80,000 Gold Coins in the Different World for My Old Age

1.SummaryEnglish: Yamano Mitsuha is 18 years old when she is suddenly left with no family. It is then that she accidentally falls off a cliff to her certain death... only to wake up in a strange new world!

2.SummaryEnglish: Having acquired the ability to jump between worlds, Mitsuha returns to the village. As she learns more about her new surroundings, her money-making schemes begin to take shape..

3.SummaryEnglish: Mitsuha finally arrives at the estate of Count Bozes, only to be turned away at the gate. Now she must find a way to enter the manor, so that she can assume the role of foreign noblewoman, Mitsuha von Yamano!

4.SummaryEnglish: With the support of Count Bozes, Mitsuha secures the funds to open a general store in the royal capital. Stocked with goods from Japan, Mitsuha's ready to rake it in! If she can make her first sale, that is...

5.SummaryEnglish: After a visit from the head chef of the Viscount Reiner's family, Mitsuha ends up in charge of the debutante ball for Adelaide, the viscount's daughter. Can she manage to throw a dinner party that's out of this world?

6.SummaryEnglish: With the debutante ball a success, Mitsuha's eager to get back to running the shop. However, it seems the Bozes family has different plans! And there's something that's been troubling their daughter, Beatrice...

7.SummaryEnglish: After a run-in with a fugitive, Mitsuha approaches the mercenaries who saved her with a curious proposal: allow her to tag along on one of their adventures. Her goal? To perform market research, of course!

8.SummaryEnglish: An adorable and elegant blonde girl by the name of Sabine visits the shop. Mitsuha manages to save Sabine from being kidnapped by a ruffian, but as it turns out, there's more to Sabine than meets the eye...

9.SummaryEnglish: Mitsuha is visited by Alina, whose family runs a restaurant on the verge of being taken over. With trouble brewing in paradise, it's up to Mitsuha to use every trick up her sleeve to save this mom-and-pop business!

10.SummaryEnglish: Mitsuha is hatching a new money-making scheme when news arrives that the kingdom is under attack! As the invading army closes in on the capital, Mitsuha finds herself at the palace, faced with a decision...

11.SummaryEnglish: Mitsuha and the captain successfully repel a horde of goblins, thanks to a stroke of ingenuity. Now it's up to Mitsuha to rouse the mercenaries of Wolf's Fang to action, so they can confront the Empire's army!

12.SummaryEnglish: Just when it seems that the battle against the Empire has been won, Mitsuha is faced with her most fearsome foe yet: a powerful ancient dragon who has been the mastermind behind the invasion all along!
